name: expired
description:
expired is a point-and-click horror game made for my year-end basic computer science class assignment. expired was made using Python and pygame. It has a few bugs that I wasn't able to iron out. (More details in the readme file)

Also, no idea if I can even post this game here since I'm using Minecraft for the art. We'll see what happens, I guess.
